description: Try our easy to follow Vietnamese Chilli Chicken Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vietnamese Chilli Chicken Pizza Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tray on pizza stone and bake for 1520 minutes or until the crust is golden brown. Remove from oven and top with bean shoots and coriander. Cut into wedges to serve. Repeat with remaining dough, paste and toppings. Note: Pizza stones help crisp the base. If you don't have one, just the oven is fine.
